title: Monster hunter portable 2ndG ENGLISH PATCH
description:
This patches a Japanese Monster hunter portable 2ndG psp ISO into English.

----------
INSTALL
----------
Extract the files into the GAME folder of the PSPs memory stick.
Run in psp but make sure you have an MHP2NDG iso in the ISO folder which should be in the root of the memory stick.

Custom psp firmware required.
Tested on firmware 3.80m33-5

I have not tested it on any other psp firmware.
